Browser-size Image

The browser-size image module spans the entire width of the viewport. The module should not be inside of any containers that would restrict the module from spanning the entier width. The module is optimized for stacking, as seen on the front-page of the Blurb Stories site.

07/03
2014

Free from clients and limitless in creative possibilities. Free from clients and limitless in creative possibilities.

By Dan in Creative Dispatches
View Story
Show Source
